2019 DraftKings League

Welcome a new member

geru | 08 Oct 2019

Everyone, please welcome jpascua. He decided to join us starting Week 6 and, like everyone else, paid the $50 membership fee. This will increase the first place winnings from $30 to $35, second and third place winnings remain unchanged. This also means a new contest must be started in order to accomodate an extra member. Please make sure you use the link on this site to submit your lineup. Also, please withdraw your entry from the DraftKings-generated contest if you’ve already submitted one. You don’t need to re-do your lineup though, you can simple import it to the new contest. Thanks all and good luck in Week 6!
